note:
English and Polish translator. GNU/Linux user.
I like people and I care about free, ethical and nondiscriminating software.
Pleased to provide free translation for activists and FOSS projects.
If you're interested in software freedom or need help, I would love to be of assistance.
Always happy to learn and talk about a wide range of important and unimportant topics.
You can contact me through a DM or email ♥️

Header and avatar under CC BY 4.0 license by @davidrevoy.

fields.name: Header image
fields.value: Mascots representing free culture and free software projects such as Pepper&Carrot, Linux, GNU and Mastodon working and having fun together. Drawn in a cartoony style in vivid colors.

fields.name: Avatar
fields.value: Face of a cartoony worm with glasses, reading a book. In subdued colors.
